definition: four horse military chariot (archaic)/four (archaic)/generic term for history books
to ride/to mount/to make use of/to avail oneself of/to take advantage of/to multiply (math.)/Buddhist sect or creed
to ride (in a car or carriage)/to drive/to motor
to ride as a passenger/to travel by (car, plane etc)
to change train (plane, bus etc)/transfer between modes of transport
to take the opportunity/to take a plane
attendant on an airplane, train, boat etc
to embark/to travel by ship/to ferry
service (on a train, a plane etc)
to seize the opportunity/to strike while the iron is hot
to cool off in the shade

sentences.chinese: 我們乘出租汽車到車站去。

sentences.english: We took a hovercraft across the English Channel.
sentences.chinese: 我們乘氣墊船橫渡英吉利海峽。

sentences.english: This is my first journey by the through train to Guangzhou .
sentences.chinese: 這是我第一次乘直達車去廣州。

sentences.english: I can do anything on the subway.
sentences.chinese: 我乘地鐵的時候可以做任何事情。

sentences.english: This place is close and convenient to the street-car.
They trekked back to the village.
We are on the train from Xi'an to Tianshui.
sentences.chinese: 我們正在乘搭火車衝從西安到天水。

sentences.english: This is the bus which they took.
sentences.chinese: 這是他們所乘的那輛巴士。

sentences.english: We may ride the magnetic suspension train to go to the Pudong international airport.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以乘磁懸浮列車去浦東國際機場。

sentences.english: The brave young man voyaged single-handed in his yacht for months.
sentences.chinese: 勇敢的年輕人獨自乘遊艇航行數月。

sentences.english: Slippery after arriving by slope, can multiply telpher return slope top again.
sentences.chinese: 滑到坡底後即可乘纜車再次回到坡頂。

sentences.english: Yes, but it's far away from here. You'd better take bus No. 69 to get there.
sentences.chinese: 是的，不過那兒離這有點遠，您可以乘69路車直達。

sentences.english: Hop a fast train and sit back - Cupid will be waiting for you when you get to your destination.
sentences.chinese: 乘上火車出行吧，丘比特在終點等待你呢。

sentences.english: I still had to continue my uphill walk after taking the pictures to find the bus stop to take me back to Tsuen Wan.
sentences.chinese: 其後還要繼續步行到下一個巴士站才乘巴士回到荃灣。

sentences.english: It's a long way and maybe we can go there by pedalo.
sentences.chinese: 這條路很長，也許我們可以乘腳踏船到那兒。

definition: to ride as a passenger/to travel by (car, plane etc)

(of a bus, train etc) to leave for/heading for

to return/to go back/to come back
